revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Review proofreading corrections; date note; note on Edward and Martha's visit
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.p:
i write a few lines to say i received your letter yesterday and papers and the letter and graphic on saturday Saturday the pictures in the graphic is very good and very solemsolemn some of them) but the hudson riverHudson River horror is awful in the extreme it is enoughf enough to make one shudder) i am better of my cold but are quite lame it seems as if the pain and lameness is all settled in my left knee i can walk rather better this morning but yesterday i was quite bad but i think it will be better in a day or two i have had a weakness in my right hand and wrist you can see by my writing it looks some like yours yours waltWalt when your thumb was so bad how is your thumb joint is it better or dont don't you think about it georgeGeorge was home
last saturday Saturday stayed till mondayMonday the weather was so cold he dident didn't go back till mondayMonday) we are looking for matt this week or next i hope this will find you well walterWalter dear

O i must tell you i got a letter from Charley Heyde yesterday it certainly was the best i think he ever wrote he always when he writes to me begins with mrsMrs. whitmanWhitman this was commenced with dear mother whitmanWhitman he said han had two letters from waltWalt and by what he said she was pretty well i thought to myself when i read his letter has charleyCharley heydeHeyde got relegion religion it was so different from his former letters probably the next will be the old stile style good bie walterWalter dear write to me as often as you can i have no reason to complain of you though

postscript.p: eddEdd is quite good and helps me all he can
